content.raw:
now exactly sure how to do that here.  Do you mean having something like below using references?

~~~
<model name="model_0">
    <material_property name="my_plastic_part">
        <elastic_modulus>0.1e+9</elastic_modulus>
        <poissons_ratio>0.3</poissons_ratio>
    </material>

    ...

    <link name="link_0">
        <collision name="collision_0">
            ...
            <surface>
                <contact>
                    <material_property>my_plastic_part</material_property>
                </contact>
            </surface>
        </collision>
    </link>
</model>
~~~

This could be complex to get right completely. Can we first get current simple model working correctly before moving forward with references?  And listing default properties in the documentation or sdf description?
